website_summaries.verdict: The best way to create plump lips with a touch of color and shine.
pros: High-shine formula wears well on its own and on top of lipstick
Gives lips an instant, subtle pouty look with a beautiful tinted finish
One swipe per lip is all you need, so you won't run out too quickly
cons: Tingling sensation is intense, but only lasts about 60 seconds

customer_reviews.title: I feel the burn
customer_reviews.text: It works. After a while of using it you dont feel the tingle as much so your lips quickly adapt.
customer_reviews.author: LucidWays

customer_reviews.title: The best I’ve ever found
customer_reviews.text: The best lip plumper and color I’ve ever found. 31 now, have used various plumbers since 15-16 in high school. This ones the best. The color “Spice” looks great on everybody I’ve seen wear it. Nude but fades into your natural color. Just TOO DANG expensive. Oh well, gotta look good.
customer_reviews.author: lokilu

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think it would work but it really did! I have small lips and it make my lips look big. They say tingling feeling but it feels like it’s on fire but it hurts less than getting your eyebrows waxed. It lasted for 30-60 minutes, I wish it was longer but I’m still very happy with product!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: First time trying a product like this and it definitely makes my lips look more full. Tingles a lot when you put it on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Burning Sensation
customer_reviews.text: The product leaves a burning sensation on your lips. Not going to use.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: One time purchaser
customer_reviews.text: Tingled but had no plumping effect. A lot of sparkle.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Received Product
customer_reviews.text: I received the product on time. I love it but the price was really high for a lip gloss but couldn't find it anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: It’s stings a bit but then you get used to it
customer_reviews.text: The stinging isn’t too bad which is good and I kinda have big lips they’re just not plump so it plumped it a bit but it works it looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Anahie Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: NOPE
customer_reviews.text: 2 stars for the color which is nice but it does NOTHING ELSE.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Darling

customer_reviews.title: There's a Lot to Like About this Plumping Gloss
customer_reviews.text: I love the sting feeling you get from this colored gloss. While it doesn't actually plump lips very much...neither do any of the other brands I've tried...and I've tried a lot of different brands! I also like how saturated the color is for a gloss. And last I'm discovering that the Two Faced brand offers high quality product lines that cost significantly less than many other high end competing brands. Overall I'd buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: vsajewel

customer_reviews.title: Naturally plumping
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect natural looking shade of lipgloss. It tingles a bit but not like others I have tried in the past. It doesn't plump dramatically but I noticed a slight plumping effect. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BritBeeTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Sample size
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as City Lips or Buxom and much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: TFreeman

customer_reviews.title: When you apply this gloss it feels great! after a few seconds you have it on
customer_reviews.text: When you apply this gloss it feels great! after a few seconds you have it on, it burns your lips. Burning is to a pleasant feeling, and when you go to wipe it off it takes forever to rub off even with soap and water. even though it does pump up your lips it turns them incredibly pink and burns very bad. Definitely not worth the price. I suggest you to not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Color is much too light
customer_reviews.text: I thought this lip gloss would add a bit of subtle nude color to my lips. But the actual color was so light it made me look sickly.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Robertson

product_meta.title: Too Faced Lip Injection Glossy Juicy Color Plumping Lip Gloss in Spice Girl (Spiced Nude Shimmer) 0.14 FL OZ
product_meta.description: This moisture-rich gloss is infused with our bestselling Lip Injection formula for instant plumping results plus a tint of juicy color.
feature_bullets: Get instantly sexy lips with the look of more volume and juicy color.
This moisture-rich gloss is infused with our bestselling Lip Injection formula for instant plumping results plus a tint of juicy color.
Infused with avocado and jojoba oils
